title: Gorgon
description: Magical monsters that resemble iron-scaled bulls. Dwell in plains or foothills.
extras: Charge: When not in melee. Requires a clear run of at least 20 yards. Gore inflicts double damage.	Petrifying breath: Cloud 60’ long, 10’ wide. All in the cloud are turned to stone (save versus petrify to avoid). Unharmed by own breath.
